name: Link Exchange Lite
author: Cristian Merli

sections.description:
Link Exchange makes it easier to exchange links with other sites by avoiding you the whole contact-wait-contract-wait-agree-post link process.
Who wants to exchange link with you has to submit a form and you are then notified. You can review their proposal and accept it or reject it.
All you have to do is to send your link exchange form page to other webmasters if you are the one contacting them.
Once you approve a request, that site will be automatically posted on your site.
Use the shortcode [link-exchange-form] where you want to show the request form.
Use the shortcode [link-exchange-list] where you want to show the list of approved links.

Known Issues

  • None at the moment.
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the zip file into your WordPress plugins folder such that the plugin files are at: wp-content/plugins/link-exchange/...
  2. Activate the plugin within your blog’s administration options.
  3. All done!

short_description: Webmasters that want to exchange links with your site can submit a request form after adding a link to your site on their site first.
